creditline: Gift of Thomas Murray in honor of Roger Hollander
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: pullover style with flaring hem; vertical slits at front and back center; vertical slit neckline; long sleeves; tan with brown applied geometric patterns and designs in patchwork-like fashion separated by decorative zigzag bands; several rectangular areas of text; indigo trim at inner neckline, bottom hem and sleeve ends at inside
title: Tunic
